name: ag-grid-community
description: Advanced Data Grid / Data Table supporting Javascript / Typescript / React / Angular / Vue

scripts.initLatestEssential: npm run initSubModules && sh ./scripts/switchToBranch.sh latest && npm run updateAndRebuild
scripts.init: npm run initLatest && npm run updateAndRebuild
scripts.init-prod: npm run initLatest && npm run updateAndRebuildProd
scripts.clean: npx lerna run clean && npx lerna clean --yes
scripts.bootstrap-npm: node scripts/patchLerna.js && node customise.js && npx lerna bootstrap --no-ci
scripts.bootstrap: node scripts/patchLerna.js && npx lerna bootstrap --no-ci --registry http://52.50.158.57:4873 && node customise.js
scripts.package: npm run package-1 && npm run package-2 && npm run package-3
scripts.docs-react-only: cd grid-packages/ag-grid-docs && export AG_SERVE_FRAMEWORK=react && npm run serve-framework-only-new
scripts.docs-angular-only: cd grid-packages/ag-grid-docs && export AG_SERVE_FRAMEWORK=angular && npm run serve-framework-only-new
scripts.updateAndRebuild: npm i && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.updateAndRebuildProd: npm i && npm run bootstrap && npm run build-prod
scripts.cleanAndRebuild: npm run clean && npm run updateAndRebuild
